products.title: White Blackout Blind for VELUX ® skylights
products.metadescription: Some would say that this blind is too white. Those people are wrong. Being such a sharp white can only be a good thing, as it allows this blind to work like a dream in those crisp, monochromatic schemes that are so popular in homes around the country.

products.title: Cream Velux Blackout Blind for VELUX ® skylights
products.metadescription: Oh goodness, not another beige I hear you say. That is exactly what I said when I was told to write a unique description for the Cream Velux replacement blind, but fear not, this is a lovely cream shade that is perfect for adding some contrast to your

products.title: Luna Blackout Earth Brown - Silver Frame Velux Keylite Fakro Dakstra
products.metadescription: Luna Blackout Earth Brown - Silver Frame Velux Keylite Fakro Dakstra in Brown. Made to measure from £19.00 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Velux Keylite Fakro Dakstra includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Our Luna Blackout roof blinds come in 8 colour options - a great way for you to upgrade your skylight window at a value cost. 
 
This option comes with sleek, modern aluminium framework. 
 
This fabric has an acrylic coating backing and provides up to 20% heat loss reduction.
 
 Product ID: DB-SRB0047 Fabric Colour: Earth Brown Material: 100% Polyester Lining: Acrylic coated white backing Headrail: 53mm Deep Cassette & 30mm Wide Side Channels     Energy Saving Rating: ER3 - Highest Energy Saving Value - UV Protection and Effective Thermal Retention Blackout: Yes

products.title: Galaxy Solar Blackout White Pleated Skylight Blind
products.metadescription: Galaxy Solar Blackout White Pleated Skylight Blind in White. Made to measure from £55.64 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Pleated Skylight Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Galaxy Solar Blackout, a beautiful pleated set of blinds which comes in many different colours and are perfect for a kitchen.
 
  Product ID: DB-PLS0110 Fabric Colour: White Material: 100% Polyester Headrail: White rails and hardware with pull down tab and visible guide wires to support the blind fabric.     Control Type: Pull down tab - 100cm reach rod available at extra cost Energy Saving Rating: ER3 - Highest Energy Saving Value - UV Protection and Effective Thermal Retention Blackout: Yes

products.title: Galaxy Solar Blackout Silver Pleated Skylight Blind
products.metadescription: Galaxy Solar Blackout Silver Pleated Skylight Blind in Grey. Made to measure from £55.64 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Pleated Skylight Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Galaxy Solar is the range of blinds made from pleated fabric that will add more texture to your room.  
 Ideal for sloping windows, this beautiful blind is elegant and stylish. The blackout feature makes it perfect for those who want to create darkness in the room at any time. 
 
 Product ID: DB-PLS0047 Fabric Colour: Silver Material: 100% Polyester Headrail: White rails and hardware with pull down tab and visible guide wires to support the blind fabric.     Control Type: Pull down tab - 100cm reach rod available at extra cost Energy Saving Rating: ER3 - Highest Energy Saving Value - UV Protection and Effective Thermal Retention Blackout: Yes

products.title: Light Beige (1085) (Blackout)
products.metadescription: Buy made to measure Light Beige (1085) (Blackout) Velux Blackout Roller Blinds from SoEasy Blinds. Order quality Velux Blackout Roller Blinds online today at low prices with fast UK delivery
products.productdescription:
The Velux blackout blind offers light proof seal for total darkness anytime. It is ideal in bedrooms, where you need complete light control to ensure a good nights sleep or restful nap during the day.

 	Total blackout - best on the market.
 	Oeko-Tex certified.
 	Stepless positioning.
 	Slim design integrates perfectly with your roof window.
 	Available in 24 colours.
 	Installs in minutes.

The Velux blackout blind offers light proof seal for total darkness anytime. It is ideal in bedrooms, where you need complete light control to ensure a good nights sleep or restful nap during the day.

 	Total blackout - best on the market.
 	Oeko-Tex certified.
 	Stepless positioning.
 	Slim design integrates perfectly with your roof window.
 	Available in 24 colours.
 	Installs in minutes.
